OrgName.entry: PLACES FOR PEOPLE - YOUNG PERSONS HOUSING PROJECT

Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides temporary supported housing for men and women aged 16-25 years in 20 units. Also 6 units providing permanent accommodation for teenage parents. All temporary units are furnished. Tenant Support Service available to all ages. Self or any referral.

category.entry: HOUSING, ADVICE AND SUPPORT FOR HOMELESS OR VULNERABLE PEOPLE
